akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 99–603, title I, § 101(b)(1)(C), Nov. 6, 1986, 100 Stat. 3372

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1816. Repealed. Pub. L. 99–603, title I, § 101(b)(1)(C), Nov. 6, 1986, 100 Stat. 3372
Section, Pub. L. 97–470, title I, § 106, Jan. 14, 1983, 96 Stat. 2589, prohibited employment of illegal aliens.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal applicable to employment, recruitment, referral, or utilization of services of an individual occurring on or after first day of seventh month beginning after Nov. 6, 1986, see section 101(b)(2) of Pub. L. 99–603, as amended, set out as an Effective Date of 1986 Amendment note under section 1802 of this title.
